title: 'Rolex' Dave:  Episode 118
content:encoded:
Hoddesdon, Hertfordshire 2003.  32 year old Dave King had just left the gym when the white transit van slowed down and the passenger carefully took aim and let fire a torrent of bullets from the AK47.

In this episode of the UK True Crime weekly podcast I look at events leading up to this shooting and what happened next.
